Flow.interviewLabel: Account - Create New RPF - Screen Flow {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Account - Create New RPF - Screen Flow

fields.name: Finish_Files
fields.fieldText: You have successfully completed the initial phase of the RFP process. You will be hearing from the RFP Team within the next two business days. Click here to view your RFP.

fields.name: sc_RFP_Opportunity_Name
fields.helpText: Format: "Property Name - YYYY-MM-DD." This is not sent in the Lead Sheet email.

fields.name: sc_Deadline_for_Intent_Notice
fields.helpText: If the RFP requires a Notice of Intent to Participate, please enter the due date here.

fields.name: sc_Deadline_for_Questions
fields.helpText: This is the due date for submission of questions to inform how to proceed with your RFP

fields.name: sc_Deadline_Submittal
fields.helpText: This is when the RFP package must be submitted

fields.name: sc_Contract_Start_Date
fields.helpText: This is an estimate for now but required by the system for making the contract record.

validationRule.errorMessage: The Estimate must be greater than zero.

fields.name: sc_Government_Contract
fields.helpText: If the loss is on a government property, then select "Yes," even if the contract is with a subcontractor to the government entity.

fields.name: sc_Government_Relationship
fields.helpText: Indirect: Contract is with a subcontractor of a government entity. Direct: Contract is directly with a government entity.

fields.name: RFP_Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
Please read the error below. Play close attention to the error after the phrase FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


To fix the errors, click the previous button to go back into the field(s) that need attention. Then, click the Next button to complete the creation of the RFP Opportunity.


Thank you!
